Typedef Documentation

typedef struct AudioSample_s AudioSample

WAV parser.

Parses a WAV file image from an in-memory image or a stream.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 1997-2005 Phil Burk, Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL
